infoArray.name: autoWidth
infoArray.desc: If true, the width of the menu will be set automatically according to the widths of its children, using proper keyline increments

infoArray.name: disableAutoFocus
infoArray.desc: If true, the menu will not be auto-focused.

infoArray.name: initiallyKeyboardFocused
infoArray.desc: If true, the menu will be keyboard-focused initially.

infoArray.name: listStyle
infoArray.desc: Override the inline-styles of the underlying List element.

infoArray.name: maxHeight
infoArray.desc: The maximum height of the menu in pixels. If specified, the menu will be scrollable if it is taller than the provided height.

infoArray.name: multiple
infoArray.desc: The maximum height of the menu in pixels. If specified, the menu will be scrollable if it is taller than the provided height.

infoArray.name: onChange
infoArray.desc: Callback function fired when the menu is drawer menu updated.

infoArray.name: onBackButtonClick
infoArray.desc: Callback function fired when the menu back button is pressed.

infoArray.name: menuItemSelected
infoArray.desc: Callback function fired when the item selected.

infoArray.name: clearBlankItems
infoArray.desc: Callback function fired to make empty.
